description.text: A Software Quality Assurance (SQA) Engineer, also known as a Software Tester or Quality Assurance Engineer, is a professionaly responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of software applications or systems. Their primary goal is to identify and prevent defects or issues before software is released to end-users.
description.infotext: Here are some key responsibilities and tasks typically associated with the role of an SQA Engineer:

description.additionaltext: To be successful as an SQA Engineer, one should possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and good communication skills. Knowledge of various testing methodologies, tools, and programming languages is also beneficial in this role.
